name: log-001
text: Captain's Log — We departed Earth Spacedock at 1100 hours. Crew spirits are high as we set course for Proxima Centauri.

name: log-002
text: Encountered unexpected micrometeoroid field. Shields held; minor hull scarring on Deck 7. Engineering running diagnostics.

name: log-003
text: First successful test of the new graviton drive. Achieved 0.82c for twelve minutes before safeties engaged.

name: log-004
text: Picked up a faint distress beacon near the Tau Ceti debris belt. Altering course to investigate.

name: log-005
text: Arrived at beacon source: derelict freighter ISS Mercator. No life‑signs detected. Security teams boarding.

name: log-006
text: Recovered Mercator's flight recorder. Evidence of a reactor breach; cause undetermined. Memorial service scheduled.

name: log-007
text: Passed through the Helix Nebula. Spectacular filament structures—science division collected terabytes of sensor data.

name: log-008
text: Diplomatic first contact with the Lyran Collective successful. Exchanged cultural data and established a comms relay.

name: log-009
text: Medical alert: unknown pathogen detected in hydroponics bay. Quarantine in effect; Dr. Haru leading containment.

name: log-010
text: Pathogen neutralized; no casualties. Course laid in for return to Earth to report findings and replenish supplies.
